Privates Eye

lol. my first photography assignment in a  year, and its a free shoot. the only one i'll get this semester. i've decided to shoot at this fish store owned by these two little weird chinese people, that try to sell me salt water fish every time i go in. i'm going to shoot above and through the glass. sounds horrible? bite me. i really want to see how this turns out. i took too many pictures of flowers while i was in high school. alright, im out for the day....

xoxo
michele

Kamera - wilco I need a camera To my eye To my eye, reminding Which lies have I been hiding Which echoes belong I've counted out Days to see how far I've driven in the dark With echoes in my heart Phone my family Tell 'em I'm lost on the sidewalk And no it's not okay

If everything we are ever told is a lie except one, consider this... nothing is what it seems to be. the moment you think you've got everything figured out, it will be nothing like you thought. i think the best thing to do is ____________________. once you've got it figured out, please be kind enough to share. hanging out with casie today. good times, good times. i'm officially in college and waiting for Ruby's to call me back.. there words were ... "congrats, you've got the job.. we'll call you and let you know..." k. what does that mean? *sigh* so i'm getting a phonecall from them today. i'm missing david, i wish he would come back to CA today. i wish so much. we could be watching movies on the couch right now. anyways, its not ok. but i'm going to tell myself it is.. because i have a pack of ML, sundried tomato bagels and a happy place to go to. xoxo michele <3

Peace. of Mind.
written by me.

i'm sorry. youre under the illusion that this doesn't happen often
i'm sorry. your voice was so loud
i'm sorry. you never told me
i'm sorry. i never did make you proud

i'm sorry. that i dreampt that dream
i'm sorry. that i had to scream
i'm sorry. that your breath was hot
i'm sorry. then again i'm not

i'm sorry. that you hate your life
i'm sorry. you fucked your best friends wife
i'm sorry. you're too blind to see
i'm sorry. you blame it all on me

i'm sorry. we couldn't do it twice
i'm sorry. life could not suffice
i'm sorry. that you're in the ground
i'm sorry's such a distant sound
k. i own these. and that makes me awesome.
you want it? yeah.. i thought so! who wouldnt!??! click the pretty little ballerina happy box .yay!

my little brother graduates from high school in 10 hours.
it's a lot bigger deal than i thought it would be. he's so smart, so funny... and he's going change our world someday. congrats parker. i love you. <3 your sister

woo! class was so fun! 
omg how i missed taking classes. dude. fuck academics. im going to take apparel design and photography forever. i made the KOOLEST stuff. 
anyways,
i have jury duty tommorow from 7:30am to 5pm.
im going to bed. 

xoxo

dont forget....

- call Ruby's tommorow to see if you got the job. 
- call the Jury Duty Line to see when you report
- pay for camera bag
- clean room
- fill prescription

- stab your local congressmen and women

xoxo
thats all for today,
- michele

It's so strange. i've upped my medication dosage and i feel even worse? how can that be. i doubled the intake. ech. that right there makes me feel even worse. the san diego trip was awesome but i cant get over this "casie's dad's girlfriend" thing. i just WISH there was SOMETHING i could do. i was around the woman for 2 days and that night i hoped the woman would die in her sleep. I just want to help Casie soooooo bad. she's seriously one of the best people with the biggest hearts i know. my mom and i talked about this refusal to face reality thing lastnight. my conclusion: its defenitely time to grow up. wether it makes me a bitter old woman someday, atleast i will be a woman and not the little girl that i feel like. my grandparents are in town for my brothers graduation. he's 18 you know? he's getting SOOO old. anyways, this is depressing, him and i are going to be starting our freshmen years of college together. dammit. and i'm supposed to call tommorow to see if i got the job at Ruby's. if i didnt... does anyone have any suggestions for a cool place to work? i've got to clean. my room is embarassingly dirty right now. i could shoot my mother for going through things while i was gone. *sigh* OH! and remind me to make an appointment with my optometrist. thanks! xoxo michele alyssa<3
made by thankyou darlin!
click me for hot stuff.

SAN DIEGO was effing awesome. here are pictures! 1. me and cas in the car on the way up. with the radio turned WAY down. 2. Cas, Me and Mae looking awesome. because we are. 3. me being lame. 4. the cutest doggy puppy EVER. this ones for you Mae. sorry i couldnt get a picture of the little mexican girls. 5. Mae being perfectly sweet and cute. 6. Our View From the Hotel Room 7. Yeah. sup. yeah... chillax bro. 8. Casie and Mae molesting a bear 9. Cas and i on the carride back, listening to Rick Springfield. yeah... dont mess. Woot! XOXO, micheley pie

woo hoo. i'm going to san diego tommorow. Casie and her "family?" invited me out to the gaslight quarter in south san diego. were going to stay the night in an awsome hotel.. and its going to be fabulous! im so excited! casie and her dad are freakin awesome. plus.. dude, its casie, how can i have a bad time? im going to bring some embroidery to work on in the car. but im going to be gone saturday and sunday. yay. 

tonight my Dads friend Didi gave me a little chinese silk purse. and i love that even more! woo hoo! 
i wanted to get one for casie but she only had one = (
and im going to be hanging out with Erika on monday. 
things are going good...

my mom thinks im homicidal and depressed. but the truth is im just dissapointed. getting out of high school and not having someone tell me what to do with my day isn't as great as i thought it would be. but i find myself thinking more independently, i just need to work on trying to make everyone but myself happy. i feel like half of the things i do (except quitting my job) are for everyone else.
but the truth is, my cousin, Danielle, who is 2 weeks older than me, is having her second baby and has no where but with her bum fuck parents. her dad is an idiot and her mom is a fat slob drug addict.. so, the truth is... i have more going for me than i think. i have a wonderful boyfriend, beautiful friends, jeremy, caitlin, my family who loves me no matter how stupid i think.. and i still have air in my lungs. so.. everything will be ok.

im in davids sweatshirt tonight, so its kinda like him holding onto me while i sleep. he's so warm and his kisses are like lemon drops. sweet and calming. 

im off to bed, my cell will be on all weekend! so im sure ill talk to y'all later!
xoxo
michele alyssa

k. tonight was completely spontanious, boring, fun and chai-filled. with marshmellows n pie! GROSS. this is really what my computer screen looks like RIGHT NOW here's my magnet/bulletin/useless shit board yeah. i'm emo. ITS HOT. no! its stupid. you know why you wear HUGE sunglasses? to cover up your ugly emo bad music taste face!!! i would too if i listened to The Starting Line!!! ps- this is davids big mexican sweatshirt we like to cuddle in hehe. someone clean my room. xoxo, goodnight people-o-people

my interview went alright. poker faced jerks! all of them. 

hopefully they loved me. 

xoxo
michele

goodnight

lastnight was so much fun. i love my girls. we drove around, honked at little kids, and went bag shopping in fullerton, Erika and Casie are the kewlest chicks in the world, and i cant wait to see how cute there babies are gonna be. but we went out to the irvine spectrum and ate at johnny rockets and got free food. then i bought a planner at Barnes and Noble. but we hung out on the train tracks and took pictures and killed carissa.. here are el picturas... so yeah.. off to clean the house! oh! and i got some new red lipstick. lets see how good this one works.

What/!?~!)(~@()*!&@(!*  am i doing up this early. blah. today i have an appointment with the ADD specialist. thats a good thing. i just hate the doctors office procedure. the nurses are idiots, the people in the waiting room are unusually abnoxious. and even when you do get your personal room in the back, the one with the chart of the ears and musculatory system, he leaves you there for a good half hour with nothing but an old "Parenting" magazine. i HATE it. i hate the way i tell him ive skipped my last 2 periods, and he goes into how abstinence is key. DAMMIT! im not preagnant! one would have to have sex to get preagnant!!! i'm irregular! always have been! seriously, he's been my doctor for three years and he still hasnt figured this out. 

anyways, ive got to go shower and get ready. 

-me

i am in love with this gopher....
if he could talk.. he would say.. "gopher.. sun tanning.. gopher"

new aim screen name : dolly outta hell someone keeps IM'ing me, asking for pictures and when i block him he makes another screen name. so now i have a new one! but its ok! because you all wanted to know my screen name anyways! right!??! right?!?! yeahh... thats what i thought. <3me

i got a job! 

at Ruby's at the south coast plaza. yay. 

wow. i hope i look cute in the little uniform. ive never done waitressing before. im going to try really hard to be really good at it. 
xoxo
-michele

goal : save up some money to move out. 


- Make Stones for Moms work at 50 bucks a pop.
- Work for Kip and Devin Part time / Personal Assistant
- Work for Andy formatting legal documents
- Put Designs on Ebay, handbags and hand-made shirts
- Roxys' T-shirt Design / Advertising companies
- Develop my own "style" with my photography.
- Stop buying shoes

but most of all.. smile a whole lot and do what makes me happy. 

YEAH!

ive just planned out the next year!

i quit. i quit disneyland. i'm scared, because iv'e been working there for so long but you know what? i wasn't happy there, and i am still young, and i dont have any kids to pay for... and im going to go find something more creative to do with my time = ) i feel good, this is going to be a good new thing for me.... ok, so i've been jobless for about 4 hours now... and i already have 3 offers! wooo! see what i mean? fuck disneyland, its a fucking fascist regime! im going to do something creative and fun and pay off all of my debt. watch me kick ass.. here i go! *kicks ass* oh, and i cut my hair off a little.. only about an inch and a half, so its not SO rediculously long... and i put chunks of hot pink in it! i'll show you tommorow! damn. tooo many pictures. here's a better one taken of long hair though. look i'm yellow! i'm off to bed! soooooooo much to do tommorow! *hugs* xoxo, baby blue, your know who.
